author: danielsh
msg: Prevent the Python tests from changing the pristine repository by installing
hook scripts on it that disallow any changes.  Previously, changes to the
pristine repository were silently allowed, and could lead to non-local test
failures.  See this thread for details:
Subject:  Re: svn commit: r29434 - trunk/subversion/tests/cmdline
Install always-failing start-commit, pre-lock, and pre-revprop-change hooks
on the pristine repository (after initialising it).

author: arfrever
msg: Delete the 'gnome-keyring' branch which was merged to trunk in r31337.
